resources.string: "The Cuisine Catalog is inspired by family, because that is what brings us together to even get the chance to enjoy food. Cook for your family, your friends, a stranger? Enjoy the process, the discipline, the art, and learn something new! Then eat up enjoy, and do it all over!"

"Street art lomo cred you probably haven't heard of them VHS taxidermy palo santo selvage migas photo booth. Humblebrag occupy tumeric, authentic hashtag chillwave thundercats tilde etsy franzen. Slow-carb offal brunch tumblr chartreuse neutra."
Click here for the full recipe!
